00010 using namespace TREX::europa;
00011 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00012 
00013 EuropaReactor *DeliberationFilter::s_current = NULL;
00014 
00015 void DeliberationFilter::set_current(EuropaReactor *me) {
00016   s_current = me;
00017 }
00018 
00019 DeliberationFilter::DeliberationFilter(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg)
00020   :EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawFilter(cfg, true), m_assembly(s_current->assembly()) {
00021   // TREX::utils::SingletonUse<details::Schema> schema;
00022   debugMsg("trex:horizon", "Created for reactor "<<s_current->getName()
00023           <<"\nid is "<<getId());
00024   setExpression(toString()+":horizon_"+s_current->getName().str());
00025   s_current->set_filter(this);  
00026 }
00027 
00028 void DeliberationFilter::set_horizon(TICK start, TICK end) {
00029   debugMsg("trex:horizon", "horizon set to ["<<start<<", "<<end<<")");;
00030   m_horizon = EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(start, end);
00031 }
00032 
00033 bool DeliberationFilter::test(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) {
00034   EUROPA::TokenId token;
00035 
00036   debugMsg("trex:horizon", "check for "<<entity->getKey());
00037   // std::cerr<<"Filtering "<<entity->toString()<<std::endl;
00038   if( EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId::convertable(entity) ) {
00039     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId var = entity;
00040 
00041     // exclude singletons
00042     if( var->lastDomain().isSingleton() ) {
00043       debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding singleton "<<var->getName().toString());
00044       return true;
00045     }
00046 
00047     EUROPA::EntityId parent = var->parent();
00048     if( parent.isNoId() || EUROPA::ObjectId::convertable(parent) ) {
00049       debugMsg("trex:horizon", "global variable "<<var->getName().toString());
00050       return true;
00051     }
00052 
00053     if( EUROPA::RuleInstanceId::convertable(parent) ) 
00054       token = EUROPA::RuleInstanceId(parent)->getToken();
00055     else 
00056       token = parent;
00057     
00058     if( !token->isActive() ) {
00059       debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding inactive token "<<token->toString());
00060       return true;
00061     }
00062   } else 
00063     token = entity;
00064   if( m_assembly.ignored(token) ) {
00065     debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding ignored token "<<token->toString());
00066     return true;
00067   }
00068   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &start_time = token->start()->lastDomain();
00069   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &end_time = token->end()->lastDomain();
00070   
00071   if( end_time.getUpperBound() < m_horizon.getLowerBound() ||
00072       start_time.getLowerBound() >= m_horizon.getUpperBound() ) {
00073     debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding out of window token "<<token->toString());
00074     return true;
00075   }
00076   return false;
00077 }
